dialog: You are the Peach Girl. The evil dragon spirit Orochi has swallowed the sun and interrupted the balance between the spirit and human worlds.
It is up to you to defeat the evil spirits, retrieve the sun, and restore harmony to the human and spirit worlds.
X to dodge and dash , in this game you should use it wisely since it consumes more moving energy.
Try to kill those yokais, and if you are luck enough to level up...
You have a choice to make, either by saving the yokai or sacrifice the yokai, but overall regardless of what you choose your stats will be boosted for a bit.
Also, throughout the level there will be turtle looking kappa that you will find helpful for leveling up after killing them, so when you see they don't hesitate to kill them!

speaker: neptune
dialog: Find helpful items in chests. They restore your energy or protect you from certain elemental powers of the Orochi.
As the guru, I have to tell you something... You could kill the dragon by destroy their weakly exposed scale if you see them!
Now peach girl! Go and get the dragon! The world is on your hand!!!
